content: I just have to say ‘Thank you’ for saying it out loud-“Accept that it’s okay to quit.” I always knew this that quitting a book won’t make me a loser but I just couldn’t face the fact that I am going to quit on a book I started. It always feels like I am going to miss something incredible if I don’t complete it. I am going to quit one book today which I have been trying to finish for past three months. Thank you, again.
